Input: Is it fair to ask may partner if he can refrain from talking about calories? My partner is an endurance athlete and has been increasing his training intensity, frequency, etc. It is happened a handful of times now where, around meal time, he will reference how many calories he burned per his app or whatever he uses to program his workouts. For context, he references calories in this context like, \u201cI am ready to eat because I am so unusually hungry, which makes sense because I apparently burned x calories during my workout\u201d. He is aware of my ED history and has been supportive so far. I want to ask him not to talk about calories in front of me because it is honestly triggering. That said, I do not know how to approach this conversation or if it is even fair of me to make this request. TIA for any advice or support.
Response: Do not make a request about the calories. Do not get him to tell you how much he has consumed to burn.

Input: Partners drug test kit was positive. I am seeking advice. My partner of 10 years has always struggled with addiction. Heroin in the past, opioids and benzos etc. He is currently getting monthly buvidal (Buprenorphine) injections at his doctor.. I have been trying to support him as much as I can. We have been through a lot and I adore him. He is not a bad human, he is a hard working beautiful human that is struggling. Last night I took a drink from a water bottle in my car, that he had bought that day - it tasted like chemicals and I felt strange after. Upon asking him, he denyed anything (maybe It was in my head). I got an at home drug test kit this morning and tested the bottle/ water. It tested positive for opioids and methadone. I confronted him and he said he f'd up.. I do not know what to do.. it is the looking me in the eyes and lying.. I feel like such a fool. We are actively trying to conceive.. I am feeling numb as it is just a repeat cycle of dishonesty. The trust is broken. I do not know who to turn to for support.. for either of us. I have attended appointments with his doctor, I did not think opioids were supposed to have an affect when on the injections.. that taking drugs were pointless. I do not know what to do anymore.. I am exhausted by it.. and I am fully aware he is too.
Response: We need to talk and help him out with what we variasi of actions that he can take for him to function better. His doctors are the ones that will handle this. I would say we are going to want to work on his life in a way we can do for him to make the most out of it.

Input: What could I do if a friend or family member has my concern?
Response: You could ask the family member to talk to them, or even find a professional in the community who will be with you in a year to help you find new people and start new things. They can then take the time to discuss what they think they can be, and if they cannot reach you before the week, call your local library to ask for help. Ask for a list of things that you have to write to make sure the person you want to talk with can understand the situation. You may be surprised how much people have their concerns listed on the website. The most common concerns that a family member and friends has to write to include is that they may get a lot of messages on their phone while their friend is alone or is alone with friends or family members, and that they may get very difficult memories of childhoods that they did not have in life or that they have a great childhood and that they may have serious problems for themselves. They can still get messages through the same way. If it seems like you have a problem or need someone to talk to, call the nearest librarian.

Input: My finnal exam near, bt my mentall helth is geting wors. Any advise?
Response:
Congrats on your paperwork, I hope this helps. It is honestly difficult but I hope you can put it to someone else. It will help, even if you are a bit less confident, as it is. I would suggest waiting until it is time to fill your paperwork. 
 Also, if it is time to fill the paperwork in the exam, then you might be able to ask those who have given you your paperwork the best. They will usually tell you their data in the end, so you can make changes on your data if you are not a trained professional. 
 If you want to get some help from your parents or your school, they could try to help you with your paperwork. You should go see them to be sure. They could also be your team if it is appropriate, depending on your area. If you do not have a trained professional, just ask your school and a parent to talk with you. It will be great. I wish you all the best to come to terms as the title says, and find the motivation to do the next step. 
 You may need to wait until you have the next exam to start with, to reduce the chances of it failing. If this is what you want, you may see that you have already had enough at home at home to be ready to fill the paperwork. 
 I have a sort of theory, that I was given a list of things that I would have to do to help me, and that I should have the exam and learn at home. This included that I should be doing the tests in the examination to make sure I am not self harming. There are other things that I can do, and it is up to you to fill the paperwork with that information. 
 For context, I would explain what I did in your paperwork. Also, I will say, that you are getting a list of things that you have to do in the examination. You are getting a list of things you have to do, even if you have to do some work towards getting your paperwork completed in the examination. 
 The best thing to do is to talk to someone who specializes in your field so that you can find the correct person to meet with. This can be a long time process and work to see where you can get help or get the correct information. You can also tell people who will be around for you to see if it works. 
 Work out is great in the right hand for you if it is that important. To me, it sounds like no matter how bad it is, I always knew when I was doing my tests, I could always work out, as a kid. The thought of it makes me so anxious right now. I just got it off my mind, and I am working out. I do not know what the point is, but if you have a goal, it is great. And if you are on your paperwork, it can give you some motivation to do the things you do. You can fill with whatever you would do in your next paperwork.
